alert.note: Alert for Adair; Cass (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 19 at 4:56PM CDT until August 19 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CASS...WESTERN UNION...EASTERN ADAMS AND SOUTHWESTERN ADAIR COUNTIES... At 456 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Lake Icaria, or 10 miles northeast of Corning, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Green Valley Lake, Cromwell, Green Valley Lake State Park, Creston, Kent and Creston Municipal Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
